credit_line: Gift of Wilma and Henry Godfrey
title: Tile
description: Light buff earthenware body  with press-molded design of trees in a landscape.  Various mat glazes inlight green, dark green, brown and blues defined by raised partitions. The design of this tile is associated with a group of eight tiles that when placed together form a fireplace frieze entitled "The Pines".  Each element of the design is segmentsed by cloisons of clay, the raised contours partitioning the inlaid  glazes. Copper frame.
name: Tile
